001/*

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
011
012import java.util.Objects;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * Identifies the occurrence of a sequence used a function argument or return
018 * value.
019 */
020public enum Occurrence {
021  /**
022   * An empty sequence.
023   */
024  ZERO("", true, Occurrence::handleZero),
025  /**
026   * The occurrence indicator {@code "?"}.
027   */
028  ZERO_OR_ONE("?", true, Occurrence::handleZeroOrOne),
029  /**
030   * No occurrence indicator.
031   */
032  ONE("", false, Occurrence::handleOne),
033  /**
034   * The occurrence indicator {@code "*"}.
035   */
036  ZERO_OR_MORE("*", true, Occurrence::handleZeroOrMore),
037  /**
038   * The occurrence indicator {@code "+"}.
039   */
040  ONE_OR_MORE("+", false, Occurrence::handleOneOrMore);
041
042  @NonNull
043  private final String indicator;
044  private final boolean optional;
045  @NonNull
046  private final ISequenceHandler sequenceHandler;
047
048  Occurrence(@NonNull String indicator, boolean optional, @NonNull ISequenceHandler sequenceHandler) {
049    Objects.requireNonNull(indicator, "indicator");
050    this.indicator = indicator;
051    this.optional = optional;
052    this.sequenceHandler = sequenceHandler;
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Get the occurrence indicator to use in the signature string for the argument.
057   *
058   * @return the occurrence indicator
059   */
060  @NonNull
061  public String getIndicator() {
062    return indicator;
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Determine if providing a value is optional based on the occurrence.
067   *
068   * @return {@code true} if providing a value is optional or {@code false} if
069   *         required
070   */
071  public boolean isOptional() {
072    return optional;
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Get the handler used to check that a sequence meets the occurrence
077   * requirement.
078   *
079   * @return the handler
080   */
081  @NonNull
082  public ISequenceHandler getSequenceHandler() {
083    return sequenceHandler;
084  }
085
086  @NonNull
087  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleZero(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
088    int size = sequence.size();
089    if (size != 0) {
090      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
091          null,
092          String.format("an empty sequence expected, but size is '%d'", size));
093    }
094    return ISequence.empty();
095  }
096
097  @NonNull
098  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleOne(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
099    int size = sequence.size();
100    if (size != 1) {
101      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
102          null,
103          String.format("a sequence of one expected, but size is '%d'", size));
104    }
105
106    T item = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
107    return item == null ? ISequence.empty() : ISequence.of(item);
108  }
109
110  @NonNull
111  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleZeroOrOne(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
112    int size = sequence.size();
113    if (size > 1) {
114      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
115          null,
116          String.format("a sequence of zero or one expected, but size is '%d'", size));
117    }
118
119    T item = sequence.getFirstItem(false);
120    return item == null ? ISequence.empty() : ISequence.of(item);
121  }
122
123  @NonNull
124  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleZeroOrMore(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
125    return sequence;
126  }
127
128  @NonNull
129  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handleOneOrMore(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence) {
130    int size = sequence.size();
131    if (size < 1) {
132      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
133          null,
134          String.format("a sequence of one or more expected, but size is '%d'", size));
135    }
136    return sequence;
137  }
138
139  @FunctionalInterface
140  public interface ISequenceHandler {
141    /**
142     * Check the provided sequence matches the occurrence.
143     * <p>
144     * This method may return a new sequence that more efficiently addresses the
145     * occurrence.
146     *
147     * @param <T>
148     *          the sequence item Java type
149     * @param sequence
150     *          the sequence to check occurrence for
151     * @return the sequence
152     * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
153     *           if the sequence doesn't match the required occurrence
154     */
155    @NonNull
156    <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> handle(@NonNull ISequence<T> sequence);
157  }
158}
